survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and attitudes towards eco-friendly packaging in the retail industry.

questions.question_text: How important is eco-friendly packaging to you when making a purchase?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly layout for small screens.

script.question_text: How important is eco-friendly packaging to you when making a purchase?

questions.question_text: Which types of eco-friendly packaging are you most familiar with? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Randomize answer options to avoid bias.

script.question_text: Which types of eco-friendly packaging are you most familiar with? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors influence your decision to choose products with eco-friendly packaging?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with text field for additional insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes with an open-ended option.

script.question_text: What factors influence your decision to choose products with eco-friendly packaging?

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium for products with eco-friendly packaging?
answer_options: Yes, depending on the price difference
questions.client_notes: Use clear, concise options to capture willingness to pay.

answer_options: Yes, depending on the price difference

questions.question_text: Please share any additional thoughts or suggestions regarding eco-friendly packaging.
